numbered_ace_sentences: 2. In every major sport except baseball, more than half of the players are people of color.
3. In these sports, most coaches are white people.
5. The data was taken in a certain year.
7. I wonder whether the year of the data affected the results.
8. Professional sports are becoming more diverse slowly.
10. Some young people of color idolize athletes of different races.
11. This idolization inspires some young people of color.
12. Some young people of color strive to become professional athletes.
13. Some young people of color strive to become coaches.
14. Diversity in professional sports has increased in recent years.
